Kenosha.Kenosha Elks Club:
The Kenosha Elks Club is a historic building in Kenosha, Wisconsin. Construction began on the building in 1916 and it was formally dedicated on January 20, 1919.


== History as the Elks Club ==
Plans to construct a club house for the Kenosha chapter of the Benevolent and Protective Order of Elks began in 1916 when 300 members pledged $65,000 for the purchase of land that formerly housed the Petit Malt House, which burned down in 1914.
